tooltip.item.hextale.raw_hextech_crystal: I can feel the object emitting some sort of energy, and I think we should be cautious because it might unexpectedly explode.
tooltip.item.hextale.hextech_pickaxe: I feel a surge of energy when using this tool.
tooltip.item.hextale.hextech_axe: I feel a surge of energy when using this tool.
tooltip.item.hextale.hextech_helmet: You feel a surge of strength when you put on this armor.
tooltip.item.hextale.hextech_chestplate: You feel a surge of strength when you put on this armor.
tooltip.item.hextale.hextech_leggings: You feel a surge of strength when you put on this armor.
tooltip.item.hextale.hextech_boots: You feel a surge of strength when you put on this armor.
tooltip.item.hextale.cube_hextech_crysta: A processed crystal into a cubic shape.
tooltip.item.hextale.rectangle_hextech_c: A processed crystal into a rectangular shape.
tooltip.block.hextale.suspicious_remains: It seems like this block conceals crystals within it. We should try using a brush to extract them.
tooltip.block.hextale.base_cutting_machi: A crystal processing station will suffice for basic processing and doesn't require any special skills.
